title: Works Without Upkeep — Calendar / Scheduling Tools
description: Use this gate when you want a scheduling tool that won’t turn into ongoing admin work.
A tool fails if it needs recurring setup or maintenance to keep working smoothly (services, staff, routing rules, payment layers).
Pick the option that stays simple after you set it up once.

tools.name: Square Appointments
tools.note: Requires service/payment setup and ongoing admin upkeep.

tools.name: Zoho Bookings
tools.note: Staff/services and booking rules tend to require ongoing tuning.

tools.name: Setmore
tools.note: Booking configuration becomes maintenance if your needs change.

tools.name: Microsoft Bookings
tools.note: Often involves org/admin settings and continued configuration.

tools.name: YouCanBook.me
tools.note: Integrations and rules can feel like ongoing maintenance over time.
